subject: IMF COMPENSATION
body:
IMF COMPENSATION
Greetings to you.
This is to inform you that the International Monetary Fund [IMF] and
the United Nations [UN] is compensating all the scammed victims
$20,000,000.00 United States Dollars.
Your name and email address was mentioned to the United States Secret
Service by one of the Scammers who was arrested.
Meanwhile this Compensation department has been mandated by the IMF
and the United Nations to transfer your compensation funds to you
through Online Transfer Payment which is 100 % Guarantee for payment
to you as one of the scammed victim.
Furthermore we advise you to stop any further communication with any
other person(s) or office(s) concerning any transaction that you might
have lost your hard earned money to avoid losing more money to other
group of scammers who are on the FBI wanted list and are still on the
run and for this reason we want to warn you not to communicate or
duplicate this message to anyone for any reason whatsoever as the
United States Secret Service are already on the trace for the other
criminals.
You are hereby advised to contact the IMF/UNCC head office to receive
your Compensation without further delay on this email address;
internationalmonetaryfund22@usa.com
Anticipating your urgent co-operation in other to receive your payment.
Fill The Form Below :
Full Name :
Home Address :
Age/Occupation :
Valid Phone number :
Country/State:
Kindly get back to us by reconfirming your full information. Thank
you, God Bless America.
WASHINTON DC, USA
United States Chat conversation end Type a message.

subject: Re: IMF COMPENSATION
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the compensation from the IMF and UN for scam victims. I appreciate your efforts in this regard.

However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further. Could you please provide more details about the process of receiving this compensation? Also, could you confirm if there are any fees or charges that I need to pay upfront?

Here are my details as requested:

Age: 35
Occupation: Software Engineer
Country: United States
State: California

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Stephan

subject: Re: IMF COMPENSATION
body:
Hello how are you doing today? Well there’s no much process all you’ve to
do is indicate how you want your fund to be delivered either by ATM Card,
Check or Cash on consignment box. The next one is yes there’s a fee but
that’s not the problem now until your arrangement for your transaction is
done but it won’t cost more than $300 and that’s for Tax Levy, Stamp Duty
and File Renewal

Sincerely,

Kristalina
